publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2263.2# Mr John Home Robertson: The Closure of Rural Primary Schools in Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2263) in the name of Alex Johnstone, leave out from "calls on" to end and insert "deplores the fact that the Conservative-dominated administration on the Scottish Borders Council is currently seeking to close several excellent village schools". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2263.2 # Mr John Home Robertson: The Closure of Rural Primary Schools in Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2263) in the name of Alex Johnstone, leave out from “calls on” to end and insert “deplores the fact that the Conservative-dominated administration on the Scottish Borders Council is currently seeking to close several excellent village schools”. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
